PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03912022-04-19,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add fourteen (14) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; and (2) remove the duplicate listing of two (2) individuals from Schedule 1 of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0084 Publication Date: 2022-05-11
AttachmentsAttachment
